summary: Build a clean, premium, high-converting landing page website for QuickOnline (service helping local shopkeepers get professional websites), using a white background with blue/black startup-style design and core conversion sections (hero, benefits, pricing tiers, testimonials, contact, footer).
architectural_notes: Single-page, landing-page-style site optimized for conversions (CTAs throughout).
Visual style: clean white base with blue/black accents, bold typography, soft shadows, smooth animations, mobile-first responsive layout.
Contact CTAs (Call + Messages/WhatsApp) must target phone number 9113112297.

existing_features.title: Implement a single-page, high-converting landing page for “QuickOnline” with the following sections in order: Hero, Benefits, Pricing (3 packages), Testimonials, Contact (WhatsApp + Call buttons + simple contact form), and Footer.

Apply the requested visual design direction across the page: clean white background, blue/black accent palette, bold typography, soft shadows, smooth animations, premium startup/agency look (not childish), and fully mobile-responsive layout.
Hero section content must clearly communicate the value proposition for shopkeepers and include a prominent primary CTA button designed to maximize conversions.
Pricing section must present 3 packages (Basic, Standard, Premium) in a comparison-friendly layout with clear inclusions and a CTA per package.

Contact interactions must be functional: WhatsApp button opens a WhatsApp chat link and Call button uses a tel: link; the contact form must validate required fields client-side and provide a clear success state after submission (no backend required).

Establish a coherent, creative visual theme (layout system, spacing, typography pairings, section styling, and button styles) that fits a premium startup agency aesthetic while keeping the requested white + blue/black palette (avoid adding additional dominant colors).
Add generated brand visuals as static assets and use them on the landing page (do not serve images through the backend).
Update the Contact section WhatsApp and Call actions to use the phone number 9113112297.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create QuickOnline premium landing page with hero, benefits, pricing (3 packages), testimonials, contact buttons/form, and footer; white background with blue/black accents, bold fonts, mobile-friendly, smooth animations; goal is to convert shopkeepers.
Set the Contact section Call (tel:) and Messages/WhatsApp links to use phone number 9113112297.
